title: Configure a New Leave Policy in HRIS
description: The company is introducing a new 'Volunteer Time Off' policy, and it needs to be configured in the HRIS.

tasks.description: Receive the specifications for the new leave policy (e.g., accrual rate, annual limit).
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin receives the policy details: 8 hours granted annually.

tasks.description: Configure the new leave type and its accrual rules in the time and attendance module.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin successfully sets up the new leave plan in the system.

tasks.description: Assign the new leave plan to all eligible employees.
tasks.expected_outcome: Admin successfully grants the new leave benefit to all employees.
